bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Frank J. Beardon. Bill of Costs
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

org.orgName: District Court of Washington Territory, Fourth Judicial District

div1.p: In the District Court November Term A.D. 1885 at Cheney Territory of Washington County of Spokane} ss
In the District Court of Washington Territory, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County for Spokane, Lincoln and Douglass Counties. November Term A.D. 188

The Territory of Washington
vs.
Frank J. Bearden} 1701
Indictment for Habeas Corpus
for S.P. White
a Witness
COST BILL.
Lincoln County.
Clerk's fees D.A. Clement Clerk
Oct 24

Docket & appearance .50
File afft. & Petition .20
Order for Habeas Corpus filed .10
Issue Writ 1.00
Serving original on sheriff 1.00
Returned file issue .35
Taxing costs .50
Two transcripts .80
Two Certificates 2.00
+6.45
Lincoln County
To H. B. Mason

Expense in serving writ of Habeas Corpus upon S.P. White at Territorial Penitentiary at Seatco in Thurston County and in conveying prisoner to and from the penitentiary to Cheney in Spokane County as a witness before the District Court.

Mileage from Cheney to Seatco 467 mi. 46.70
Serving writ on Prisoner 1.00
Mileage from Seatco to Cheney 467 miles 46.70
Mileage of Prisoner from Seatco to Cheney 46.70
4 meals for prisoner 75 cents 3.00
Board of prisoner at Cheney 12 days @ 10 12.00
Mileage from Cheney to Seates. Returning prisoner to Penitentiary 467miles 46.70
4 meals for prisoner 75 cents 3.00
Mileage of Deputy from Seatco to Cheney 467 miles} 46.70
$299.20
CERTIFICATE OF PROSECUTING ATTORNEY.
I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and that the same amounting to the sum of $305.65/100 is just and correct.

S.C. Hyde
Prosecuting Attorney for Lincoln County.
CERTIFICATE OF PRESIDING JUDGE
I certified that I have examined the foregoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $ and the same appearing to me to be just and correct, is hereby approved and allowed.

George Turner
Associate Justice Supreme Court Washington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District
CERTIFICATE OF CLERK
Territory of Washington COUNTY OF} ss.

I, Clerk of the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, do hereby certify that the above and foregoing is a true and correct transcript of the costs in the above entitled cause, as the same now appears on record in my office.
In testimony whereof I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the seal of said Court, this day of A.D. 188 Clerk By Deputy
In the District Court of Washington Territory. Fourth Judicial District.
Oct. Term at Cheney

The Territory of Washington
vs.
Franklin J. Bearden
BILL OF COSTS.
Filed 188 Auditor.
